reviews.review_msg: She is fantastic. Very approachable, however I can see how students with a lower level of french would feel intimidated. She is a lovely lady to talk to and very intelligent. She is very willing to give extra help when you are sick and interested in her subject. I never felt like she didn't want to be there, so that was nice! A+ :-)

I am a straight A student and could barely even get a B- in this course. He does not listen to student comments. He also makes you feel stupid when you ask questions. I was excited to take this course, but after it started it was my worst nightmare. After studying every night, it still was not enough!
